sentences.sContent: Yes, first, and then to go to Paris.
sentences.sContent_eng: Yes, first, and then to go to Paris.
sentences.sCn: 是的，先是去结婚，然后还得到巴黎去一次。

sentences.sContent: They have invited me to go to Paris with them.
sentences.sContent_eng: They have invited me to go to Paris with them.
sentences.sCn: 他们邀请我和他们一同去巴黎。

sentences.sContent: I know nothing about him except that he is from Paris.
sentences.sContent_eng: I know nothing about him except that he is from Paris.
sentences.sCn: 我只知道他是来自巴黎，其他的就不知道了。
